name: Invoice Inbox
description: Automated parsing of invoices from CSV/XLS/email attachments into draft expense records.

prd.problemStatement: Manual invoice entry is time-consuming and error-prone. Automated parsing from common formats speeds up expense tracking.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want invoices parsed automatically so that I save time on data entry
As a superintendent, I want vendor matching so that invoices are categorized correctly
